commands.help:
Résumé shell, version 1.0-release
These shell commands are defined internally. Type `help' to see this list.

help
ls
cat
sh

System administration lead.Doing: Working as a technical lead to identify and implement solutions to problems affecting IT services
In detail: Installation, maintenance and troubleshooting of all hardware and software systems
Building and configuration server and desktop hardware
Providing consultation and advice on selection IT equipment

Full stack developer.Doing: Working as a frontend and PHP developer on varied aspects of the custom web software implementation
In detail: Developing new components and extending software functionality
Support and troubleshooting of the existing software

IEEE Latvia section member.Doing: Popularising computer science and electronics among Latvian students to gather more fresh minds and develop a better future

2018 IEEE SYP Congress participation sch.Doing: Enhancing and fostering the engineering sense and capabilities through different activities both technically and culturally
